about_the_game:
This DLC include new skin for Van - Gold Skin with red boots.(New skin will be available on all game maps)
When you buy this DLC you can play only for Gold Van, If you want play for original Van - you need delete DLC and if you will want play for Gold Van again - you will need install this DLC.
detailed_description:
This DLC include new skin for Van - Gold Skin with red boots.(New skin will be available on all game maps)
When you buy this DLC you can play only for Gold Van, If you want play for original Van - you need delete DLC and if you will want play for Gold Van again - you will need install this DLC.
